name: react-email-templates
description: This app uses [React](https://reactjs.org) & [Quill](https://quilljs.com/) to provide [tutorly](https://www.tutor-me.io) users an email template solution.

scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false cd client && npm install && npm run build
